name: @apiteam/types-commonjs
description: APITeam shared datatypes - packaged for CommonJS so can be used by the api service

scripts.install: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf ./src-copied && cd .. && cp -r ./types/src ./types-commonjs/src-copied && cd types-commonjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json && rm -rf ./src-copied
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf ./src-copied && cd .. && cp -r ./types/src ./types-commonjs/src-copied && cd types-commonjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json && rm -rf ./src-copied
